name: Jam Mega
text: I placed an order at 9:59 not knowing the store closes at 10:00. Online it stated 11:00pm was closing time.  Nevertheless the staff went ahead and fixed my huge order. This was a great experience something I really appreciated especially with a hungry group of teenagers after a late game.

name: Todd Brusa
text:
If you order this pizza with extra sauce they will automatically put extra cheese to cover it at no cost of course.
The only way to order pizza from a chain restaurant.

text: Called in my order it was ready before I arrived everything I ordered was correct, hot and fresh. The lady that took my order was very sweet and was willing to help with any questions I had.

text: I've been here for 17 minutes and my order isn't ready yet. On top of that the associates in the back seem ti be having a blast back there, all you hear is laughing and joking. They don't seem to realize there's people here waiting on orders.
